name: Bunting Labs
headline: Digitize geospatial data locked on paper and in PDFs
description: Bunting Labs is automating the digitization of maps into GIS and CAD software.

founders.name: Michael Egan, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Bunting Labs, History @ USC

founders.name: Brendan Ashworth, Founder
founders.description: Brendan studied physics + AI at MIT ('22). Previously: Software @ IBM, Minio, Node.js core team.

#  The Suite of AI Tools  Built Into ![QGIS](https://buntinglabs.com/static/img/organization_logos/qgis.svg) QGIS
### Kue AI Assistant
### AI Vectorizer
### AI Georeferencer
### Deed Digitizer
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Kue can read and edit your QGIS project, integrating a chatbot with your map data. 
[ Learn more ](https://buntinglabs.com/</solutions/kue-ai>)
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Digitize features in geologic maps, as-builts, aerial imagery etc. in half the time with our AI Vectorizer. 
[ Learn more ](https://buntinglabs.com/</solutions/ai-vectorizer>)
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Our AI model scans your map and places control points. All you have to do is review and accept them. 
[ Learn more ](https://buntinglabs.com/</solutions/ai-georeferencer>)
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Converts legal descriptions and deeds into vector geometries using AI (extracts metes and bounds). 
[ Learn more ](https://buntinglabs.com/</solutions/digitize-survey-plat-pdf>)
TRUSTED BY 30+ GOVERNMENTS AROUND THE WORLD

#  Kue can run 311 geoprocessing algorithms 
  * Extract vertices and segments
  * Densify geometries by interval
  * Voronoi polygons with buffer
  * Snap geometries to layer
  * Polygonize raster to vector
  * Zonal statistics by polygon


Your browser does not support the video tag. 
[ Watch Tutorial Video ](https://buntinglabs.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=ukUIf89W5VQ>)
#  Filter and select without writing SQL
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
#  Kue can style any layer
#### Scale Dependent
Chooses minimum and max zoom level that features and labels will be visible, based on the content of your vector layers.
#### Geometry Styling
Defines visual appearance through layered symbols (fill, line, marker) with configurable patterns, colors, and borders for each geometry type.
#### Label Engine
Controls text rendering with font properties, collision detection, buffers/shadows, and placement rules relative to features.
#### Conditional Rendering
Uses QGIS expressions to show, hide, or style features based on their attributes, area / length, or other properties.
#### Conflict Resolution
Manages feature/label density through priority fields, obstacle weights, and maximum label counts per view.
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
![IHE Delft logo](https://buntinglabs.com/static/img/organization_logos/ihe-delft.png)
"This is a really great plugin that helps you trace vectors in a very easy and fast way", as featured in [his YouTube review of our plugin](https://buntinglabs.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=ib-0HS5xFVs>).
![Professor Hans van der Kwast](https://buntinglabs.com/static/img/organization_logos/hans_van_der_kwast.jpg)
### Professor Hans van der Kwast
Associate Professor @ [IHE Delft Institute for Water Education](https://buntinglabs.com/<https:/www.un-ihe.org>)
![Carto logo](https://buntinglabs.com/static/img/organization_logos/carto.png)
"This is an absolutely perfect use of AI in geospatial. It takes a very manual and time-consuming task and passes that off to AI while still being able to have human intervention when needed. Amazing work!"
![Matt Forrest](https://buntinglabs.com/static/img/organization_logos/mattforrest.jpeg)
### Matt Forrest
Field CTO @ [Carto](https://buntinglabs.com/<https:/carto.com>)
[ Watch Tutorial Video ](https://buntinglabs.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=ukUIf89W5VQ>)
[ ![Bunting Labs logo](https://buntinglabs.com/static/img/bunting_bird_dark.svg) Bunting Labs ](https://buntinglabs.com/<https:/buntinglabs.com/>)
Built in San Francisco, California
[ YouTube ](https://buntinglabs.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/@buntinglabs>) [ Github ](https://buntinglabs.com/<https:/github.com/buntinglabs>) [ Twitter ](https://buntinglabs.com/<https:/twitter.com/BuntingLabs>) [ LinkedIn ](https://buntinglabs.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/bunting-labs/>)

## Company

  * Email Us

generated_description:
**Bunting Labs: Enabling Digital Transformation of Geospatial Data**

Founded in 2022 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S22, Bunting Labs is on a mission to revolutionize how geospatial data is handled. Based in San Francisco, this ambitious startup is all about unlocking geospatial data that’s been trapped on paper and in PDFs, automating the digitization of maps for use in GIS (Geographic Information Systems) and CAD (Computer-Aided Design) applications.

**The Team and Their Vision**

Currently, the company boasts a lean team of two, with Dalton Caldwell serving as their Group Partner. Bunting Labs has quickly made a mark in the geospatial sector and is recognized for leveraging AI to streamline a traditionally labor-intensive process.

**What They Offer?**

Bunting Labs provides a suite of innovative tools designed to enhance geospatial data management:

1. **Kue AI Assistant**: This tool acts as a smart helper that reads and edits your QGIS (an open-source GIS software) projects, integrating chatbot functionalities with map data.
   
2. **AI Vectorizer**: Transform geologic maps, as-builts, and aerial imagery into digital formats in half the time it typically takes.

3. **AI Georeferencer**: This tool scans maps and places control points automatically, allowing users to review and confirm these placements without the heavy lifting.

4. **Land Descriptions**: Converts legal descriptions and deeds into vector geometries, extracting crucial data like metes and bounds with ease.

These services are trusted by over 30 governments worldwide, including the United States, the United Kingdom, Brazil, India, and Australia. Such widespread adoption speaks volumes about the utility and reliability of their offerings.

**A SaaS Powerhouse**

Tagged as a SaaS company focusing on geographic information systems, B2B solutions, and AI, Bunting Labs is positioning itself at the intersection of technology and geography. If you're intrigued by geospatial data and want to learn more about how to digitize those dusty maps, check out their website: [Bunting Labs](https://buntinglabs.com).

**The Future is Bright**

With a strong foundation built on cutting-edge technology and a clear vision, Bunting Labs is poised for growth. They’re not just digitizing maps - they’re making it easier for businesses and governments to access and utilize critical geospatial data, which can lead to more informed decision-making and efficient operations. It's exciting to see a startup tackling such a significant challenge in the geospatial industry. Keep an eye on them; they’re likely to be at the forefront of geospatial innovation for years to come.
